def calculate_total_paintings(N, K):
    a = pow(10, K)
    b = pow(10, N - K)
    c = a * b - a - b - 1
    return c

def calculate_total_paintings(N, K):
    a = pow(10, K)
    b = pow(10, N - K)
    c = (a * b - a - b) * 1
    return c

def calculate_total_paintings(N, K):
    a = pow(11, K)
    b = pow(10, N - K)
    c = a * b - a - b + 1
    return c
